arts.ttl: Last-minute goal gives Mallorca great away win
arts.sum: A 94th minute added-on time goal from on-loan Girona left back Valery Fernandez saw Real Mallorca send 47,000 'Beticos' home in disbelief when the islanders scored a smash-and-grab win, putting them up to the heady heights of fifth place in La Liga. The home side were caught napping as Cyle Larin (who had his best game in a Mallorca shirt without scoring a goal) controlled the ball with his chest before putting a reverse pass into the path of Dani Rodriguez to roll in the equaliser.

arts.ttl: Rodri injury - the moment that could alter course of title?
arts.sum: A look back at the moment that could alter the course of the Premier League title, should Rodri's injury keep him out for a prolonged period.

arts.ttl: 'Rodri injury could be a season-changing blow': Man City expert 'nervous' amid midfielder concern
arts.sum: Man City expert Steven McInerney from Esteemed Kompany tells Sports Mole that Rodri's knee injury sustained in the 2-2 draw with Arsenal on Sunday "could be a season-changing blow" for Pep Guardiola's side.

arts.ttl: Arsenal fans argue reports of Rodri being out for the season are 'karma' after claiming the Man City midfielder 'tried to end Martin Odegaard's career' during international clash last year
arts.sum: Arsenal fans are showing little sympathy for Rodri following reports that he could be out of the rest of the season as they point to a challenge the City man made on Martin Odegaard last year.

arts.ttl: Rodri knee injury: Man City 'discover' how long star midfielder will be ruled out for
arts.sum: Man City midfielder Rodri will reportedly miss the rest of the season after rupturing his anterior cruciate ligament in Sunday's 2-2 Premier League draw with Arsenal at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: Man City superstar Rodri 'is OUT for the rest of the season with a cruciate ligament rupture', reports in Spain claim, in a huge moment in the Premier League title race
arts.sum: According to MARCA the City defender 'sustained a cruciate ligament tear' during City's 2-2 draw against Arsenal on Sunday. They claim a 'more definitive diagnosis' will be available later.'

arts.ttl: Rodri injury: What is Man City's record without star midfielder?
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes a closer look at Man City's record without star midfielder Rodri, who has emerged as an injury doubt following the Citizens' 2-2 draw with Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Rodri injury: Latest news, return date and what Pep Guardiola said on Man City blow
arts.sum: Guardiola was concerned as Rodri limped off during the fiery 2-2 draw against Arsenal

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola issues injury update on Rodri and Kevin de Bruyne
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola cut a frustrated figure on Sunday evening as he reflected on an action-packed draw with Premier League title rivals Arsenal. Guardiola conceded that Arsenal were “so strong mentally” to withstand for so long, strengthening their title ambitions.

arts.ttl: Mallorca boss Arrasate provides Vedat Muriqi injury update
arts.sum: RCD Mallorca head coach Jagoba Arrasate has on Sunday provided an update on the wellbeing of key frontman Vedat Muriqi. For those who may have missed it, attacker Muriqi set…
